verses.roman:
gajapati rājā śuni' kīrtana-mahattva
aṭṭālikā caḍi' dekhe svagaṇa-sahita

synonyms: gajapati rājā—the King of Orissa; śuni'—hearing; kīrtana-mahattva—the greatness of saṅkīrtana; aṭṭālikā caḍi'—ascending to the top of the palace; dekhe—sees; svagaṇa-sahita—along with his personal associates.
translation: Hearing the greatness of the saṅkīrtana, King Pratāparudra went up to the top of his palace and watched the performance with his personal associates.
